hero.title: Transform Your
hero.description: From the developers that brought you the greatest modded YouTube apps, comes Morphe - the powerful app modification tool that puts you in control

feature.ad-blocking-desc: Block all ads and enjoy uninterrupted content across your apps
feature.sponsorblock-desc: Skip sponsored segments automatically with community-powered timestamps
feature.show-dislikes-desc: See real dislike counts to make better viewing decisions
feature.swipe-controls-desc: Control volume and brightness with intuitive swipe gestures
feature.custom-themes-desc: Personalize your app with beautiful custom themes and colors
feature.hide-content-desc: Hide unwanted content, Shorts, and recommendations for a cleaner feed

how-it-works.title: How Morphe Works
how-it-works.subtitle: Simple, powerful, and built for everyone
how-it-works.step1-desc: Download the latest version of Morphe and install it on your Android device.
how-it-works.step2-desc: Select the app you want to modify. Currently Morphe supports YouTube and YouTube Music.
how-it-works.step3-desc: Morphe will automatically patch your selected app.
how-it-works.step4-desc: Install the patched app and enjoy your customized experience.

testimonials.title: What Users Say
testimonials.subtitle: Feedback from real users and definitely not made up

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Morphe
faq.a1: You can patch any app you want. As long as you want YouTube or YouTube Music. We're constantly working on expanding support to more apps.
faq.a2: As safe as modifying obfuscated bytecode can be. All source code for Morphe is open source and free for anyone to inspect. Our community actively reviews and contributes to the codebase.
faq.a3: Only if your phone decides to brick itself. Otherwise your device will be fine. Morphe only modifies app packages and doesn't touch system files.
faq.q4: Can I customize apps to my preference?
faq.a4: Yes, but don't blame Morphe if your app becomes too customized for you to handle. It's recommended to customize up to your preference level and no more.
faq.a5-part2: for analytics: no cookies, no personal data, nothing sold, and nothing shared. Morphe does not add analytics or data collection to any patched apps.
faq.a6: Because "Android App Modification And Transformation Tool" (AAMATT) is not very catchy. And because Morphe implies it morphs your apps into something better.
faq.a7: No. But also yes. It's advanced bytecode manipulation that feels like magic.
faq.a8-part1: Yes! See the contribution guidelines in our
faq.a8-part2: . If you don't have developer skills, we always appreciate

donate.title: Support
donate.description: Your contribution helps us continue developing and improving Morphe
donate.why-1: Keep Morphe free and open source
donate.why-4: Enable faster bug fixes and features

microg.title: Download
microg.description: microG is required to use YouTube Morphe and YT Music Morphe
microg.feature1-desc: microG provides Google Play Services support, enabling the use of your Google account with YouTube Morphe and YT Music Morphe.
microg.feature2-desc: microG is an open-source reimplementation of Google services that respects your privacy while providing essential functionality.
microg.feature3-desc: Install microG once and it works with all your Morphe apps. No need to reinstall when updating YouTube Morphe and YT Music Morphe.

translate.title: Help Us Translate
translate.description: Make Morphe accessible to millions of users worldwide by translating it into your language
translate.step1-desc: Create a free Crowdin account. It only takes a minute and gives you access to translate Morphe and other open source projects.
translate.step2-desc: Select the language you want to translate into. You can contribute to new translations or improve existing ones.
translate.step3-desc: Use Crowdin's intuitive interface to translate strings. Every contribution helps make Morphe accessible to more users.
translate.step4-desc: Your translations will be reviewed and included in future Morphe releases, helping users around the world.
